Package mod.chiselsandbits.api

Interface IBitAccess

All Known Implementing Classes:
BitAccess
public interface IBitAccess
Do not implement, acquire from IChiselAndBitsAPI

    • commitChanges

      void commitChanges(boolean triggerUpdates)
      Any time you modify a block you must commit your changes for them to take affect, optionally you can trigger updates or not.

      If the IBitAccess is not in the world this method does nothing.

      All changes made by a player should be committed on the client and the server, failure to commit changes on the client will cause corruption of the Undo Pipeline, causing 'Block Has Changed' errors when trying to undo blocks that have been modified only on the server, doing so also increases responsiveness in those changes for the player making them.

      Parameters:
      triggerUpdates - normally true, only use false if your doing something special.

    • getBitsAsItem

      net.minecraft.world.item.ItemStack getBitsAsItem(@Nullable net.minecraft.core.Direction side, ItemType type, boolean crossWorld)
      Returns an ItemStack for the IBitAccess

      Usable for any IBitAccess

      Parameters:
      side - angle the player is looking at, can be null.
      type - what type of item to give.
      crossWorld - determines if the NBT for the ItemStack is specific to this world or if it is portable, cross world NBT is larger and slower, you should only request cross world NBT if you specifically need it.
      Returns:
      an ItemStack for bits, which is empty if there are no bits.

    • mirror

      boolean mirror(net.minecraft.core.Direction.Axis axis)
      Mirrors all bits in the IBitAccess in the passed axis.
      Parameters:
      axis -
      Returns:
      Whether or not the mirroring was successful

    • rotate
